content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. What’s your name so we can get started scheduling your plumbing service?
Hi there! My name is George.
Thanks, George! Can you please provide your address so we can confirm service and get your appointment set up?
Actually, I think I might try to fix the issue myself first. I'll get back in touch if I need help. Thanks!
reason: Customer decided to try fixing the problem themselves.

content: No problem, George! If you need us at any point, we’re always here to help. Good luck with the repair!
reason: Customer decided to try fixing the problem themselves.
